verses.verse: It happened on the day <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> had finished setting up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and had anointed <S%H4886><s%> it and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> it, <S%H3627><s%> with all its furniture, and the altar <S%H4196><s%> with all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and had anointed <S%H4886><s%> and sanctified them; <S%H6942><s%>

that the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> offered. <S%H7126><s%> These were the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the tribes. <S%H4294><s%> These are they who were over <S%H5975><s%> those who were numbered: <S%H6485><s%>

and they brought <S%H935><s%> their offering <S%H7133><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> covered <S%H6632><s%> wagons, <S%H5699><s%> and twelve <S%H6240><s%> oxen; <S%H1241><s%> a wagon <S%H5699><s%> for every two <S%H8147><s%> of the princes, <S%H5387><s%> and for each one <S%H259><s%> an ox: <S%H7794><s%> and they presented <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Accept <S%H3947><s%> these from them, <S%H5647><s%> that they may be used in doing the service <S%H5656><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting; <S%H4150><s%> and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> them to the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> to every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his service. <S%H5656><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the wagons <S%H5699><s%> and the oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to the Levites. <S%H3881><s%>

He gave <S%H5414><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> wagons <S%H5699><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to their service: <S%H5656><s%>

and he gave <S%H5414><s%> four <S%H702><s%> wagons <S%H5699><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> oxen <S%H1241><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to their service, <S%H5656><s%> under the direction <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

But to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> none, <S%H3808><s%> because the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> belonged to them; <S%H5375><s%> they carried it on their shoulders. <S%H3802><s%>

The princes <S%H5387><s%> gave offerings <S%H7126><s%> for the dedication <S%H2598><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that it was anointed, <S%H4886><s%> even the princes <S%H5387><s%> gave <S%H7126><s%> their offerings <S%H7133><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "They shall offer <S%H7126><s%> their offering, <S%H7133><s%> each <S%H259><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> on his day, <S%H3117><s%> for the dedication <S%H2598><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>"

He who offered <S%H7126><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> was Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab, <S%H5992><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%>

and his offering <S%H7133><s%> was: <S%H259><s%> one silver <S%H3701><s%> platter, <S%H7086><s%> the weight <S%H4948><s%> of which was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> shekels, <S%H259><s%> one silver <S%H3701><s%> bowl <S%H4219><s%> of seventy <S%H7657><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary; <S%H6944><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them full <S%H4392><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meal offering; <S%H4503><s%>
one <S%H259><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> ladle <S%H3709><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels, <S%H4392><s%> full of incense; <S%H7004><s%>

one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bull, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> one <S%H259><s%> male lamb <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering;
one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%>

and for the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> head of cattle, <S%H1241><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> male goats, <S%H6260><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H7133><s%> This was the offering of Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab. <S%H5992><s%>
On the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar, <S%H6686><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> gave his offering. <S%H7126><s%>

He offered <S%H7126><s%> for his offering: <S%H7133><s%> one <S%H259><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> platter, <S%H7086><s%> the weight <S%H4948><s%> of which was one hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> shekels, <S%H259><s%> one silver <S%H3701><s%> bowl <S%H4219><s%> of seventy <S%H7657><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary; <S%H6944><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them full <S%H4392><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meal offering; <S%H4503><s%>
one <S%H259><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> ladle <S%H3709><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels, <S%H4392><s%> full of incense; <S%H7004><s%>

one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bull, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> one <S%H259><s%> male lamb <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering;
one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%>

and for the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> head of cattle, <S%H1241><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> male goats, <S%H6260><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H7133><s%> This was the offering of Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar. <S%H6686><s%>

gave his offering: <S%H7133><s%> one <S%H259><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> platter, <S%H7086><s%> the weight <S%H4948><s%> of which was a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> shekels, <S%H259><s%> one silver <S%H3701><s%> bowl <S%H4219><s%> of seventy <S%H7657><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary; <S%H6944><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them full <S%H4392><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meal offering; <S%H4503><s%>
